segments.text: Professor , can you help me add your class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have to bring me an add sheet to sign . Do you have one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I will have to get an add sheet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You must take the signed add slip to the Admissions and Records Office to add the class . Do you know where that is ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't know where that is .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The office is in front of you as you cross the quad . The signs in the hallway will tell you where you need to be .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I can find it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'll find it easily . Make sure you add the class and then we will look at the roll sheet later to make sure that you were added on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for letting me add your class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To drop a class , you need to do the same thing with a drop slip . Good luck !
segments.speaker: S2
